lines.text: Well, the sword was symbolic of you having it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The ball's been inside of me this whole time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, okay, so he has a tentacle, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No tentacle. He's just, like, this giant clawed hand and dragging Fjord by the chest wound up towards the edge of the ship.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay I want to do, like, a Black Widow wrap around his neck.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then I want to just pull his head back so his neck breaks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then I want to take his body, throw it over the side, and wrap his claw around a belaying pin so he's a warning for anybody else who would try to find the ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After you snap his neck, you throw the body over, and because the bones are, like, weirdly flexible, you take and wrap it around, and the arm actually bends, and wraps as it breaks in the same way, and dislodges at all the joints, and you take into you wrap it in and he's just now dangling off the side of the ship, the rain pouring.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, and then where's Fjord at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord is on the ground right next to you just slumped there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, there is. There's another guy, Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have another attack, if you want.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But he's on the ship? Fjord's on the ship?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's next to me right there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so the other guy, I'll take an attack on him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well yeah, where is he? I can't see with--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there, that guy's back right there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Whoever I can get to from there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, there's the guy right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to attempt to run--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And also start of his turn--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 16 points radiant damage and he's still half speed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I-- I hit him with a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha, you actually get an attack of opportunity as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do the additional damage, too, because--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, because of the poison thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb just pulls out his adder's stomach and draws it back like it's a bow and releases Melf's Acid Arrow at 5th-level.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you sure it's not Widogast's Acid Arrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, is it a dexterity save or a spell attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a natural two. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four plus additional for everything above two, so another three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this, Caleb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's turning to try and jump off the ship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, as he's jumping, a beam of green arcane energy shoots straight through the back of his head, and then just starts to melt down and melts a line down through his head, down through his neck and through his chest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Runs towards the edge and then (splashing) slumps over the side and you watch the body slowly (sloughing) melts in the middle of it and it just slops to the ground in two halves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So wait, we've got Orly and Fjord dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all, standing in the pouring rain here on the deck of your ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is he going to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need me some rain sounds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got to have some rain sounds for the drama.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we're going to end tonight's next episode.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no, I feel really bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're the ones RPing halfway through the boat voyage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We did a Chekhov play for the first hour.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm glad this happened here and not in Chicago.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, these were the things he was crafting, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those were the things I was building in secret in the hotel room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have the third orb still in me; it wasn't in the sword, it was just representative of what's in my chest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The way he was attacking you seem to be continuously going for the chest--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- where you had placed all the orbs into.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That imagery with Yasha and the Fjord dream before everything went wrong was amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What I loved was, like, you were watching Yasha have a dream and I looked over and you were like, "Thank god it's not me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so hard when it's like, I know!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I looked at Marisha and we like, "I hate it when he gets like this-- "What?!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Revivify you have to do within a minute, and it's going to be a whole week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I actually have spells that can ex-- Yeah. There's stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's stuff. I've got a lot of stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just nobody trip on the way over, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (falling, impact) Oh no, I stabbed Fjord again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you very much and is it Thursday yet? Good night.
